Title: CWA-2023-004: Excessive number of function parameters in compiled Wasm
Description:
A specifically crafted Wasm file can cause the VM to consume excessive amounts of memory when compiling a contract.
This can lead to high memory usage, slowdowns, potentially a crash and can poison a lock in the VM,
preventing any further interaction with contracts.

For more information, see [CWA-2023-004](https://github.com/CosmWasm/advisories/blob/main/CWAs/CWA-2023-004.md).
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.2.5, all versions starting from 1.3.0 before 1.3.1, all versions starting from 1.4.0 before 1.4.2, all versions starting from 1.5.0 before 1.5.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 1.2.5 before 1.3.0, all versions starting from 1.3.1 before 1.4.0, all versions starting from 1.4.2 before 1.5.0, all versions starting from 1.5.1
